hooks.prompt: Review this conversation for information worth persisting to long-term memory via the recall MCP tools (store_memory). Look for: user preferences, project decisions, architecture choices, debugging insights, workflow patterns, or personal facts the user shared. Ignore: trivial exchanges, greetings, info already in code/docs. If you find 1+ items worth saving, return 'block' with a reason listing each memory to store. If nothing worth saving, return 'approve'.
